entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kluane Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 33. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
